name: angular-microfrontend-monorepo
description: Monorepo para aplicaciÃ³n Angular con microfrontends usando Native Federation

scripts.install:all: cd apps/host-app && call npm install && cd ../micro-frontend-1 && call npm install && cd ../micro-frontend-2 && call npm install
scripts.start: echo Para desarrollo ejecutar en 3 terminales separadas: && echo 1) npm run start:host && echo 2) npm run start:micro-frontend-1 && echo 3) npm run start:micro-frontend-2
scripts.build:host: cd apps/host-app && call npm run build
scripts.build:micro-frontend-1: cd apps/micro-frontend-1 && call npm run build
scripts.build:micro-frontend-2: cd apps/micro-frontend-2 && call npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:micro-frontend-1 && npm run build:micro-frontend-2 && npm run build:host
scripts.test:all: npm run test:host && npm run test:micro-frontend-1 && npm run test:micro-frontend-2
scripts.clean:host: cd apps/host-app && rmdir /s /q dist node_modules 2>nul || echo Limpiado host
scripts.clean:micro-frontend-1: cd apps/micro-frontend-1 && rmdir /s /q dist node_modules 2>nul || echo Limpiado MF1
scripts.clean:micro-frontend-2: cd apps/micro-frontend-2 && rmdir /s /q dist node_modules 2>nul || echo Limpiado MF2
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:host && npm run clean:micro-frontend-1 && npm run clean:micro-frontend-2 && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || echo Limpiado todo
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm run install:all
